amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Public Housing Capital Fund by $7.1 million; to reduce funding for the Public Housing Operating Fund by $17.6 million and to apply the total savings of $24.7 million to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for the Public Housing Capital Fund by $7.1 million; to reduce funding for the Public Housing Operating Fund by $17.6 million and to apply the total savings of $24.7 million to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gohmert amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 266 (Roll no. 276).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gohmert amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 160 - 266 (Roll no. 276).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Gohmert.
